Fullerton, California

Fullerton is a located in the the northern region of Orange County in The State of California.

How Did Fullerton Get It's Name?

The city of Fullerton was named by brothers George and Edward Amerige, who where grain merchants from Massachusets. Fullerton was named after the president of the Pacific Land and Improvement Company, George Fullerton. The Pacific Land and Improvement Company was a part of a much larger company, Central Pacific Railroad, which was tasked by the government with building out a transcontinental railroad that sought to connect people on both the east and west side of the country.

The naming of the city begins when both brothers leave their suburb right outside of Boston, Massachusets in the late 1800's. After finally visiting California, becoming obsessed with the potential in the area, and selling their 10 acre orange ranch they had initially purchased in the Sierra Madre, the brothers began to shift their focus on establishing a city by purchasing around 500 acres of land from various owners in the area that would become The City of Fullerton. Where one of the brothers, Edward, drove a steak through a mustard field is now the corner of Harbor Boulevard and Commonwealth Avenue.

Who Where The Earliest People To Inhabit The Fullerton Area?

Fullerton earliest inhabits are known as the Tongva. The "Tongva" which means "people of the earth" are a group of Native American people who have been living in the area that is now Southern California for the last few thousand years.

The First Europeans That Came Through Fullerton Slept At Hill Crest Park

The earliest Europeans in this area actually crossed through Fullerton on their way north from what is now san diego on their way to monterrey. This expedition also known as the Portola expedition. Some of the account of the portola expedition have the Spanish Explorers sleeping in what is now hill crest park before heading off up to harbor blvd.

Fullerton California Economy

Fullerton California has a rich agricultural history that started in the early 1900's due to improvements in water distribution throughout the region. During the middle of the 20th century fullerton was a military manufacturing hub producing a lot of airplanes to help with the Pacific Now a days much like the rest of the area the economy has diversified and you.

Orange Groves In Fullerton Created The First Electric Guitar

In the late 1800's fullerton began to expedience an agricultural boom due to newer irrigation techniques. Fullerton was one of the largest orange producers in the entire world and with that came.
